contentrichtext.text: '''[[Derry]]''' (also known as Londonderry) is a city in Northern Ireland. It may also refer to: {{TOCright}} ==Places== ;In Ireland *The [[Roman Catholic Diocese of Derry]] *The [[Church of Ireland]] [[Diocese of Derry and Raphoe]] *[[County Londonderry]], also called "County Derry" *The [[GAA county]] of [[Derry GAA|Derry]] *Derry, a townland in [[County Down]], Northern Ireland *Derry, a townland in [[County Armagh]], Northern Ireland *Derry, a townland in [[County Fermanagh]], Northern Ireland *[[River Derry]] and Derry Water River in County Wicklow *Derry, a townland in [[County Laois]] *[[Derry, County Tipperary]], a townland in the civil parish of Loughmoe East, North Tipperary *[[Derry, North Tipperary]], a townland in the civil parish of Dorrha, North Tipperary ;In the United States: *[[Derry, New Hampshire]], a town *[[Derry, Pennsylvania]], a borough *[[Derry Township (disambiguation)]], numerous places *[[Derry (Stephen King)]], a fictional town in Maine used by Stephen King as the setting for a number of his novels, novellas, and short stories ==People== * [[Shaun Derry]], English professional footballer * [[Derry Irvine, Baron Irvine of Lairg]], former British Lord Chancellor in Tony Blair's government ==Other uses== *[[Derry City F.C.]], a football club currently in the Airtricity League Premier Division *[[Derry GAA]], county board and county teams in Gaelic games ==See also== * [[Londonderry (disambiguation)]] * [[Dery]] {{disambig}} [[Category:Place name disambiguation pages]]
